game.name: Evolit
game.shortDescription: Take charge of the galaxy's defense! With strategic moves, stop waves of cute yet dangerous enemies and prevent them from reaching the end of the road. Enhance your tactics with a variety of cards and unique towers, and stand against Evo! Strategy and infinity await here.

reviewHighlights.text: A classic TD game with a couple of twists. Worth a try.
